config.description: Genie space for AgenticMDM demo with curated questions and SQL instructions

instructions.title: Notes
instructions.content:
This Genie space supports executive and operational analysis of Northbridge’s Agentic MDM event in late August–early September 2025. Use gold tables for KPI-level questions (quality spikes, lineage completeness, vendor alignment, and exposure impact) and silver tables for detailed root-cause and commentary-driven investigations.

Data model and business logic:
- Quality metrics: gold_master_quality_timeseries (daily) and gold_master_quality_weekly (weekly) provide identifier_conflict_events, duplicate_candidates, and adr_etf_mapping_issues segmented by region and sub_product (ADR/ETF/ShareClass). Expect a spike beginning 2025-08-20, with normalization after the 2025-09-05 MDM rule update.
- Lineage completeness: gold_lineage_completeness_timeseries measures % of records with approved commentary or multi-vendor provenance. Dip during the event with recovery from ~2025-09-10 onward.
- Vendor changes: gold_vendor_change_log contains dated events (Bloomberg schema refresh 2025-08-19, Moody’s sector reclassification 2025-08-25, Internal MDM rule update 2025-09-05) with modules (Identifiers, ADR Mapping, Sectors) and error codes (MDM-ID-3102, MDM-LIN-2207, MDM-COM-1905).
- Exposure impact: gold_exposure_impact and gold_exposure_impact_cumulative quantify misclassified exposure ($) where holdings were pre-golden (golden_resolved=false) and sector codes changed post 2025-08-25, segmented by region and sub_product.
- KPIs: gold_security_master_summary provides total_securities and golden_records_created_last_30d; gold_open_identifier_conflicts_latest gives the latest open conflicts.
- Detailed context: silver_security_master_ingest includes standardized identifiers, flags (identifier_conflict_flag, adr_mapping_issue_flag), and sub_product; silver_steward_commentary links overrides and rationales to records; silver_holdings_report offers portfolio-level exposures.

Data quality considerations:
- EMEA ADRs and ETFs show higher variance and mapping disputes. Bloomberg EMEA suffixing changes (e.g., .LN, .GR) increased discordance. Moody’s sector taxonomy update introduced reclassification load for EMEA sector ETFs.
- Minor nulls exist in identifiers like ISIN/SEDOL; rely on pre-aggregated gold tables for fast, consistent answers.
- Temporal analyses should anchor to date fields and, for weekly views, week_start to align with vendor change timing.

Recommended usage:
- Start with gold_master_quality_timeseries to quantify the spike, then use gold_vendor_change_log for root-cause alignment.
- Use gold_lineage_completeness_timeseries to monitor recovery and gold_exposure_impact to estimate financial impact.
- Drill into silver_steward_commentary joined to silver_security_master_ingest for specific overrides and rationale threads.
- Apply global filters (region, sub_product, sector) consistently when slicing KPIs.

instructions.title: Daily Identifier Conflicts vs Baseline
instructions.content:
-- Compare identifier conflicts to baseline across regions and sub_products
SELECT d.date,
       q.region,
       q.sub_product,
       q.identifier_conflict_events,
       q.duplicate_candidates,
       q.adr_etf_mapping_issues
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_master_quality_timeseries q
JOIN demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_date_spine d
  ON q.date = d.date
WHERE d.date BETWEEN '2025-08-15' AND '2025-09-15'
ORDER BY d.date, q.region, q.sub_product;

instructions.title: Weekly Region/Sub-Product Mix of Issues
instructions.content:
-- Weekly grouped comparison for duplicates and mapping issues
SELECT week_start,
       region,
       sub_product,
       weekly_identifier_conflicts,
       weekly_duplicate_candidates,
       weekly_mapping_issues
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_master_quality_weekly
WHERE week_start BETWEEN TIMESTAMP('2025-08-18') AND TIMESTAMP('2025-09-15')
ORDER BY week_start, region, sub_product;

instructions.title: Lineage Completeness Trends
instructions.content:
-- Track lineage completeness % by region and sub_product
SELECT date,
       region,
       sub_product,
       lineage_completeness_pct
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_lineage_completeness_timeseries
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-15' AND '2025-09-15'
ORDER BY date, region, sub_product;

instructions.title: Vendor Change Log Alignment
instructions.content:
-- Align dated vendor changes to observed spikes
SELECT change_date,
       vendor,
       change_type,
       scope_region,
       module,
       notes,
       error_codes
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_vendor_change_log
WHERE (vendor IN ('bloomberg','moody\'s','internal-mdm'))
  AND scope_region = 'Emea'
  AND change_date BETWEEN TIMESTAMP('2025-08-15') AND TIMESTAMP('2025-09-15')
ORDER BY change_date;

instructions.title: Misclassified Exposure and Cumulative Impact
instructions.content:
-- Daily and cumulative misclassified exposure views
-- Daily
SELECT date, region, sub_product, misclassified_exposure_usd
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_exposure_impact
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-20' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY date, region, sub_product;
-- Cumulative
SELECT date, region, sub_product, running_total_misclassified_usd
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.gold_exposure_impact_cumulative
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-01' AND '2025-09-30'
ORDER BY date, region, sub_product;

instructions.title: Steward Overrides and Rationales
instructions.content:
-- Identify steward comments linked to master records and reasons
SELECT s.date,
       s.region,
       c.comment_id,
       c.attribute_name,
       c.old_value,
       c.new_value,
       c.user_id,
       c.approval_status,
       c.reason_code,
       s.sub_product
FROM demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.silver_steward_commentary c
JOIN demo_generator.saswata_sengupta_agenticmdm.silver_security_master_ingest s
  ON c.source_record_hash = s.source_record_hash
WHERE c.date BETWEEN '2025-08-20' AND '2025-09-12'
  AND s.region = 'EMEA'
ORDER BY c.date, c.comment_id;

mdm_quality_monitoring.title: MDM Quality, Lineage, and Exposure Impact
